programme.title: O Mito, (2005, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: O arqueólogo Jack continua tendo sonhos recorrentes de uma vida passada, onde ele é o grande general Meng Yi, que jurou proteger uma princesa chamada Ok-Soo. Jack decide ir investigar tudo com seu amigo William.

programme.title: O Retorno do Dragão - A Cidade Perdida, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Segundo uma lenda milenar chinesa, a cada 60 anos uma forte tempestade de areia revelará o local onde um tesouro sagrado que estava perdido está localizado, a região de Dragon Gate.

programme.title: Ragnarok, (2013, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Um arqueólogo fica obcecado pelos escritos encontrados em um navio viking, que podem solucionar o mistério de Ragnarok Porém, durante suas buscas, ele acaba despertando acidentalmente um monstro gigantesco.

programme.title: O Doador de Memórias, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A impressionante história de Jonas, um jovem que vive num mundo sem cor mas aparentemente perfeito, e de harmoniosa conformidade. No entanto, Jonas começa a passar mais tempo com o Doador, o único guardião de todas as memórias da comunidade.

programme.title: Em Busca da Carta Proibida, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Durante a Reforma, Klaas Voeten, um impressor de literatura proibida, é pego pela Inquisição por imprimir uma carta escrita por Martinho Lutero. Seu filho Falko é involuntariamente impelido a ajudar seu pai e a procurar a carta.

programme.title: Espião por Acaso, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: História verídica sobre o jogo de gato e rato entre o FBI tentando encontrar um espião soviético em suas fileiras e Robert Hanssen, um dos principais agentes do FBI e o provavel espião.

programme.title: D Artagnan O Quarto Mosqueteiro, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: A mando de seu pai, o jovem d’Artagnan viaja da Gasconha rural para Paris, onde se envolve em uma trama desonesta entre os mosqueteiros do rei e os guardas do cardeal Richelieu.

programme.title: O Mito, (2005, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: O arqueólogo Jack continua tendo sonhos recorrentes de uma vida passada, onde ele é o grande general Meng Yi, que jurou proteger uma princesa chamada Ok-Soo. Jack decide ir investigar tudo com seu amigo William.

programme.title: As Crônicas de Spiderwick, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: Esta aventura de fantasia é adaptada da série de livros campeã de vendas, que revela um mundo nunca visto que existe ao nosso redor.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A Retaliação, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Kurt Sloan prometeu a si mesmo que não voltaria para a Tailândia, mas alguém o seda e o força a retornar ao país asiático.

programme.title: O Justiceiro, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial problemático disfarçado deve se infiltrar em uma gangue implacável. Mas as coisas azedam quando outro policial revela seu disfarce e ele rapidamente se vê lutando por sua vida e pela vida de sua família.

programme.title: Perseguição Explosiva, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Um dublê se envolve acidentalmente em crimes envolvendo relíquias misteriosas e agora precisa lutar para sobreviver ao longo de uma série de aventuras perigosas e incríveis.

programme.title: Samurai X - O Inferno De Kyoto, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Kenshin Himura vai contra o puro mal Makoto Shishio que está tentando derrubar o governo Meiji. O destino do país está em jogo quando Kenshin Himura pega a espada que ele jurou nunca mais sacar.

programme.title: Combate, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Um jovem lutador deve decidir seu destino; desistir de tudo e treinar para honra e glória ou sucumbir à vida de um lutador de jaula por um mafioso russo.

programme.title: Punhos da Vingança, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Em Xangai, um ex-campeão de artes marciais mistas e herdeiro de uma corporação multibilionária, se junta a uma informante da polícia, para investigar a morte de seu irmão assassinado em um torneio de boxe underground

programme.title: Kickboxer: A Retaliação, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Kurt Sloan prometeu a si mesmo que não voltaria para a Tailândia, mas alguém o seda e o força a retornar ao país asiático.

programme.title: O Justiceiro, (1995, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial problemático disfarçado deve se infiltrar em uma gangue implacável. Mas as coisas azedam quando outro policial revela seu disfarce e ele rapidamente se vê lutando por sua vida e pela vida de sua família.

programme.title: Sangue Oposto, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Dmitri e James, dois poderosos assassinos de elite contratados pelo governo, se reconectam após seu último trabalho no Sudeste Asiático.

programme.title: Pink Panther Strikes Again, (1976, Comedy)
programme.desc: Chief Inspector Dreyfus (Herbert Lom) is finally driven mad by Inspector Clouseau's (Peter Sellers) incompetence and commandeers a doomsday device along with a demand for Clouseau’s death. Are 26 hired assassins a match for Clouseau's dumb luck?

programme.title: Revenge of the Pink Panther, (1978, Comedy)
programme.desc: Peter Sellers’ comedic genius shines when the hapless Inspector Clouseau is presumed to be dead. However, the very much alive Inspector travels to Hong Kong to investigate a dangerous drug lord (Robert Webber). Dyan Cannon and Herbert Lom also star.

programme.title: The Vikings, (1958, Thriller)
programme.desc: Legends Kirk Douglas, Tony Curtis, Ernest Borgnine and Janet Leigh dazzle in this epic chronicle of brutal rivalry and bloodthirsty ambition as two brothers are locked in a battle that will decide their fate...and that of a beautiful princess.

programme.title: The Buccaneer, (1958, Action)
programme.desc: General Andrew Jackson's dependence on the help of pirate Jean Lafitte to repel the British is complicated by the Governor's daughter. Set in New Orleans during the War of 1812.

programme.title: Moby Dick, (1956, Action)
programme.desc: This stellar retelling of Melville's classic is unsurpassed in entertainment, imagination and high adventure. Consumed by an insane rage, Captain Ahab (Gregory Peck) has but one purpose in life - revenge on the great white whale who disfigured him.

programme.title: Guys and Dolls, (1955, Musical)
programme.desc: In New York, a gambler is challenged to take a cold female missionary to Havana, but they fall for each other, and the bet has a hidden motive to finance a crap game.

programme.title: Marty, (1955, Drama)
programme.desc: Ernest Borgnine won a Best Actor Oscar for his role as a Bronx butcher who gives up on love, until he meets an equally lonely school teacher in this charming story that garnered a total of four Oscars including Best Picture.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night, (1967, Drama)
programme.desc: Sidney Poitier and Rod Steiger (who won a Best Actor Oscar® for his performance) shine in this classic mystery-thriller that took home five Academy Awards®, including Best Picture and Best Adapted Screenplay. Lee Grant and Warren Oates also star.

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: John Rambo is sent on assignment back to Southeast Asia to uncover evidence of still missing POWs, and ends up with his hands full when he comes up against Vietnamese soldiers still guarding the camps.

programme.title: Rambo III, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Rambo refuses to join his friend and former mentor, Colonel Trautman, on a mission to Afghanistan. The mission fails and Trautman is captured by Russian troops. Now Rambo must infiltrate the Russian fortress to save his only friend.

programme.title: First Blood, (1982, Action)
programme.desc: A soft-spoken Vietnam vet drifts into a small town looking for no trouble, but finds it in the form of a psychotic local sheriff who finds pleasure in hating him for no reason.

programme.title: Rambo: First Blood Part II, (1985, Action)
programme.desc: John Rambo is sent on assignment back to Southeast Asia to uncover evidence of still missing POWs, and ends up with his hands full when he comes up against Vietnamese soldiers still guarding the camps.

programme.title: Rambo III, (1988, Action)
programme.desc: Rambo refuses to join his friend and former mentor, Colonel Trautman, on a mission to Afghanistan. The mission fails and Trautman is captured by Russian troops. Now Rambo must infiltrate the Russian fortress to save his only friend.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible, (1996, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt, a secret agent, is framed for the deaths of his espionage team and attempts to flee government assassins after him. He races against the clock in order to discover the truth.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II, (2000, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: The world's greatest spy, Ethan Hunt, returns and partners up with the beautiful Nyah Hall to stop renegade agent Sean Ambrose from releasing a new kind of terror on an unsuspecting world.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible III, (2006, Espionage Action)

programme.title: Mission: Impossible, (1996, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt, a secret agent, is framed for the deaths of his espionage team and attempts to flee government assassins after him. He races against the clock in order to discover the truth.

programme.title: Scream VI, (2023, B-Movie Horror)
programme.desc: The four Woodsboro survivors have moved to New York City for a fresh start. Just as they begin to feel safe again, they receive that infamous call. Ghostface reemerges more brutal and relentless than ever, stopping at nothing to hunt them down.

programme.title: Scream, (2022, B-Movie Horror)
programme.desc: Twenty-five years after a streak of brutal murders shocked the quiet town of Woodsboro, a terrifying new killer resurrects the Ghostface mask.

programme.title: Scream VI, (2023, B-Movie Horror)
programme.desc: The four Woodsboro survivors have moved to New York City for a fresh start. Just as they begin to feel safe again, they receive that infamous call. Ghostface reemerges more brutal and relentless than ever, stopping at nothing to hunt them down.

programme.title: The Loved Ones (2010), (2009, Teen Screams)

programme.title: Green Room, (2016, Thriller)

programme.title: Beneath, (2007, Thriller)

programme.title: Spell, (2019, Supernatural Horror)

programme.title: The Haunting In Connecticut, (2009, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: After a family is forced to relocate for their son's health, they begin experiencing supernatural behavior in their new home, which turns out to be a former mortuary and séance parlor.

programme.title: In Fabric, (2019, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A lonely divorcée visits a bewitching London department store to find a dress to transform her life. She finds a perfect, artery-red gown that unleashes a malevolent, unstoppable curse in this frightening, seductive, and darkly funny tale.

programme.title: Death Note: Dealings
programme.desc: Ryuk, the Shinigami, or god of death, who dropped the Death Note into the human world, warns Light that someone is on his trail.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 3
programme.desc: Polnareff is pushed to his limits by Cool Ice's merciless attacks. As he awaits death, the dying Iggy manages to save him at the last minute. Polnareff then stabs Cool Ice in the head. Despite showing resilience to the attacks so far.
programme.sub-title: The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 3

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: DIO's World, Part 1
programme.desc: Polnareff finally comes face-to-face with DIO. Despite Polnareff's hostility, DIO offers to forgive him and allow the Frenchman to join his side again. Polnareff refuses, but for some reason, he cannot get any closer to DIO.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: DIO's World, Part 2
programme.desc: As night falls, the battle expands to encompass the whole city of Cairo. Amidst the melee, Kakyoin says he has a way to figure out DIO's Stand ability.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: DIO's World, Part 3
programme.desc: Thanks to Kakyoin, Joseph is able to figure out that DIO's Stand, "The World," has the power to stop time, but is quickly defeated by DIO. Jotaro then attacks The World with Star Platinum but is no match for DIO's power.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.desc: With help from Polnareff as well as putting his own life on the line, Jotaro is finally able to land a blow on DIO. Finding the shriveled body of Joseph Joestar, Jotaro becomes enraged and wages his final, desperate battle with DIO!

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Jotaro Kujo! Meets Josuke Higashikata
programme.desc: In April 1999, Jotaro Kujo travels to a town in Japan called Morioh to find a young man named Josuke Higashikata, the secret love child of his grandfather, Joseph Joestar. Upon finding him, Jotaro is surprised to learn that Josuke also possesses a Stand.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Josuke Higashikata! Meets Angelo
programme.desc: Josuke informs Jotaro about his encounter with Angelo’s Stand. Deducing that the serial killer’s Stand is capable of entering people’s bodies, Jotaro tells Josuke over the phone to stay on high alert until he arrives at his home.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Nijimura Brothers, Part 1
programme.desc: Josuke and Jotaro learn that a man with a bow and arrow was responsible for awakening Angelo’s Stand ability. Realizing the town is still in danger, they decide to find the bow and arrow before it can create any more victims.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon and his friends team up with Hisoka and Goreinu to challenge Razor again. Also helping out is Team Tsezguerra.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon comes up with a plan to beat Razor, and it requires Killua's help.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon, Killua and Hisoka face Razor head on, and a winner will finally be crowned in this dodge ball showdown!

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Tsezguerra suggests that Gon and his friends should continue training while his team distracts Genthru.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Tsezguerra's group does not return to the game and a one-on-one battle ensues, with Gon taking on Genthru, Killua battling Sub and Biscuit taking on Bara.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon is overwhelmed by Genthru's power, but he isn't backing down.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon and his friends finally defeat Genthru and collect 99 trading cards.
programme.sub-title: Ging's Friends x And True Friends

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Using cards brought back from the game, Gon and Killua head out to meet someone who they hope is Ging.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Gon and Killua decide to join Kite and his team in their research mission gathering information on the Chimera Ants.

programme.title: Hunter x Hunter
programme.desc: Kite has narrowed down the location of the Chimera Ants.

programme.title: Death Note: Dealings
programme.desc: Ryuk, the Shinigami, or god of death, who dropped the Death Note into the human world, warns Light that someone is on his trail.

programme.title: Death Note: Tactics
programme.desc: Soichiro Yagami demands to meet with L in person when he finds out that L has secretly brought FBI agents into Japan.

programme.title: Death Note: Overcast
programme.desc: Light uses the Death Note to try to get rid of the woman who could get him captured, and is shocked when it doesn't work.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Nijimura Brothers, Part 2
programme.desc: Josuke enters the Nijimura Brothers’ house to rescue Koichi, who is in critical condition after getting shot by Keicho Nijimura’s bow and arrow. But when Josuke steps into the house, he is attacked by Keicho’s Stand.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: The Nijimura Brothers, Part 3
programme.desc: After defeating Keicho, Koichi insists they find the bow and arrow and destroy it. Josuke agrees, but when the two enter the attic where the bow and arrow are being kept, they hear an inhuman noise inside.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Koichi Hirose (Reverb)
programme.desc: On his way to school, Koichi finds himself blackmailed by a man named Tamami Kobayashi, who frames him for running over a cat. A panicked Koichi starts to feel guilty for his actions when suddenly a giant lock appears on his chest!

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Toshikazu Hazamada (Show Off)
programme.desc: Josuke and Koichi get info that a student at their school, Toshikazu Hazamada may be a Stand user and decide to look into the case. Their suspicions are quickly confirmed after Hazamada’s wooden doll morphs into an exact copy of Josuke and attacks them.

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Yukako Yamagishi Falls in Love, Part 1
programme.desc: Koichi is both surprised and excited when a girl named Yukako Yamagishi says she likes him. But Koichi’s joy quickly turns into fear after Yukako begins to express her love for him in very erratic and dangerous ways.
programme.sub-title: Yukako Yamagishi Falls in Love, Part 1

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Yukako Yamagishi Falls in Love, Part 2
programme.desc: Yukako’s dangerous obsession with reshaping Koichi into a man fit for her gets worse, prompting Koichi to hatch an escape plan. He tries to call Josuke for help using a nearby pay phone but is stopped by Yukako, who anticipated his move.
programme.sub-title: Yukako Yamagishi Falls in Love, Part 2

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Let’s Go Eat Some Italian Food
programme.desc: Josuke and Okuyasu come across an Italian restaurant owned by an Italian chef named Tonio. When Okuyasu asks for the menu, Tonio explains that he decides the menu on the spot based on the customer he sees.
programme.sub-title: Let’s Go Eat Some Italian Food

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Chili Pepper, Part 1
programme.desc: Chili Pepper suddenly appears before Josuke to test his Stand powers. Josuke puts up a fight but is overwhelmed by Chili Pepper’s power. The next day, Josuke and friends learn from Jotaro that a man who can locate Chili Pepper is heading to Morioh

programme.title: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Chili Pepper, Part 2

programme.desc: Naruto

programme.title: Hidden Leaf Village receives a request from the Village Hidden in the Stars to guard a star. The star is actually a meteorite that fell 200 years ago and is said to possess mysterious powers.

programme.desc: Yuya matches minds with the quiz whiz extraordinaire Pierre L’Supérieure in a duel of wits! Can Yuya outsmart the smartest boy on Earth, or will Yuya end up scratching his head in defeat?

programme.desc: In the finale of the mind-bending match that’s part-duel, part-quiz show - one wrong answer could mean curtains for Yuya! Can he outduel and outthink a trivia whiz who’s never wrong?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Beyond Belief
programme.desc: Duelists throughout the city are continuously being attacked, and everyone is on the search to find out the who, how and why!

programme.desc: Yuya’s future takes a terrifying turn for the worse when he battles a fortunetelling foe who predicts this will be his last duel ever! Can Yuya fix his fate and avoid a devastating disaster, or has his luck finally run out?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: A Date With Fate: Part 2
programme.desc: As Yuya’s battle against the fortunetelling predictress Aura flares to its finish, it becomes crystal clear that Yuya’s danger-filled future is becoming a reality!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: For Our Tomorrows
programme.desc: Mysteries are revealed when the masked duelist who’s been terrorizing Leo Institute students is confronted and challenged to a battle royal!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Battle Between Buddies: Part 1
programme.desc: Yuya needs one more win to get into the Championship, but it will be his most difficult battle yet when he discovers he has to beat his best bud Gong in order to move on!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Battle Between Buddies: Part 2
programme.desc: The battle between best buds Yuya and Gong for a spot in the Arc League Championships rages to a friend-zied finish!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Challengers Assemble
programme.desc: Let the games begin! The top duelists from around the globe have gathered together for the Arc League Championships to find out who’s the best duelist in the world!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Something Fishy
programme.desc: Allie is looking to make a big splash at the Arc League Championship, but she soon finds herself in over her head! Can Allie’s deck of fishy friends turn the tides, or will her mysterious opponent sink her chances of winning?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Fusion Foes
programme.desc: Zuzu takes center stage in an epic rematch against Leo Institute’s dueling diamond, Julia Krystal! Will Zuzu avenge her earlier loss and walk away a winner, or will history repeat itself and leave Zuzu singing the blues?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Gong the Strong
programme.desc: When Gong’s old sparring partner sets a trap for Yuya, the only way Gong can save his friend is to forfeit his duel and get tossed from the tourney!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: The Pendulum Swings Both Ways: Part 1
programme.desc: Sylvio finally has just the thing to take Yuya down – a deck full of Pendulum Cards! Could Yuya's days in the spotlight be done for?
programme.sub-title: The Pendulum Swings Both Ways: Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: The Pendulum Swings Both Ways: Part 2
programme.desc: Yuya is off his game and on the run as Sylvio zeroes in on zeroing out his life points! If Yuya can’t get into the swing of things, this could be his final performance!
programme.sub-title: The Pendulum Swings Both Ways: Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Making the Cut: Part 1
programme.desc: Sora is psyched to put on a showstopping duel for the fans, but his opponent Shay is set to turn Sora’s one man show into a no man show!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Making the Cut: Part 2
programme.desc: Sora and Shay's heated duel hits its boiling point when dark secrets about their hidden history come to light! Could there be something sinister behind Sora’s sweet-toothed smile?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Sora’s Secrets: Part 1
programme.desc: While Yuto is looking for answers, Sora is looking to get some revenge! But when these two tangle, Yuya finds out more than he ever expected!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Sora’s Secrets: Part 2
programme.desc: Surprises are in the cards as the battle between Sora and Yuto comes to an unexpected conclusion! But just when Yuya thinks he’s seen everything, a new face shows up on the scene that makes Yuya do a triple take!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: A Dark Reflection
programme.desc: Yuya can’t believe his eyes when he finds himself standing face-to-face-to-face with two lookalikes who are out to destroy each other… and everything in sight!

programme.desc: Outnumbered, outmatched, and out of options, will Yuya tap into a deep-seeded darkness to overcome defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Identity Crisis
programme.desc: Zuzu races to stay one step ahead of a cold-blooded hunter who's hot on her heels! Can Zuzu ditch this danger, or will he prove too cunning for her to escape?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Battlefronts
programme.desc: Sparks fly in the Volcano Zone when all our heroes face off against the full fury of Fusion Dimension’s elite Obelisk Force! With more than life points on the line, the action has never been hotter!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Fighting for Fun
programme.desc: Are friends now foes as Yuya and Sora go deck to deck in a fiery face-off?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! ARC-V: Dueling Declan
programme.desc: When Yuya discovers Declan's web of lies put his friends in danger, he challenges Declan to a battle as payback!

programme.title: The Big Mom Pirates fooled! The Straw Hats have eluded their would-be tormentors with the help of the Sun Pirates! However, as the fleet of the Big Mom Pirates is still coming after them, Jimbei makes a crucial decision to help the Sunny to get away.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Man of Humanity and Justice! Jimbei, a Desperate Massive Ocean Current!

programme.title: At a great cost of energy and life, the Straw Hats make it out of Totto Land. Left behind in their wake are allies and friends, and would-be lovers. As the sea opens before them, what price has been paid for their escape?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Parting Time! Pudding's Last Wish!

programme.title: Luffy's recent exploits make their way around the world! The reputation of this mighty pirate begins to grow as all eyes look towards the Straw Hats' next move! Also - German 66 leaves an artifact behind which excites the crew!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The World is Stunned! The Fifth Emperor of the Sea Emerges!

programme.title: As the royals make their way to the Reverie, the mighty Navy takes all precautions to make sure they don't fall prey to kidnappings! At the vanguard is Koby, who glimpses Luffy's exploits and remembers their shared past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To the Reverie! The Straw Hats' Sworn Allies Come Together!

programme.title: A vicious pirate group led by Pinkbeard who describes himself as one of Blackbeard's affiliates attacks a town in the Kingdom of Lulucia while their king and able-bodied soldiers have gone to the Reverie. And four bizarre individuals come to help.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sabo Goes into Action! All the Captains of the Revolutionary Army Appear!

programme.title: At New Marineford, Sakazuki, the new Admiral of the Fleet, hears the news about Luffy and recalls the tumultuous Paramount War that haunts the Navy! That game-changing war has repercussions that last into the present!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Going into Action! The Implacable New Admiral of the Fleet - Sakazuki!

programme.title: Nobles from around the world gather for the Reverie as the echoes of the Paramount War resound! Among them are Shirahoshi and her family from the Ryugu Kingdom under the sea. Meanwhile, Admiral Fujitora has a conversation with his new colleague.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Paramount War! The Inherited Will of the King of the Pirates!

programme.title: Stelly, Sabo's adopted brother and now the king of the Goa Kingdom, walks up to Garp who is escorting the royal family of the Fish-Man Island, with an air of importance and something up his sleeve.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: One Step Forward for Her Dream! Shirahoshi Goes Out in the Sun!

programme.title: Shirahoshi and her family finally reach the Holyland of Mariejois! But all the unexpected attention confuses her. Meanwhile, Vivi from Alabasta meets Leo and Rebecca from Dressrosa, and tells them the story of her journey with the Straw Hats.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I Miss Him! Vivi and Rebecca's Sentiments!

programme.title: Vivi reunites with Dalton and Dr. Kureha from the Sakura Kingdom and they share their memories of the Straw Hats with Shirahoshi and Rebecca. Meanwhile, a shadowy figure descends a long staircase at the castle in the Holyland and opens a mysterious door.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: In the Dark Recesses of the Holyland! A Mysterious Giant Straw Hat!

programme.title: Shirahoshi crosses the fancy of a Celestial Dragon, and those living gods are not open to having their whims disobeyed! As she is dragged away, King Neptune comes to her rescue, risking life and limb by defying the Celestial Dragon.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Holyland in Tumult! The Targeted Princess Shirahoshi!

programme.title: The Emperors of the Sea, Big Mom and Kaido decide to team up against Luffy! Meanwhile, Garp hears about the wild exploits of his grandson, all while a mysterious outsider visits the highest authority in the world!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Explosive Situation! Two Emperors of the Sea Going After Luffy!

programme.title: After sneaking into the Land of the Gods, Sabo sees the shocking figure of his friend – Kuma! Abused by the World Government as a pawn in their games, Kuma, who was made an example of what happens when you disobey the gods!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sabo Enraged! The Tragedy of the Revolutionary Army Officer Kuma!

programme.title: The Reverie has begun! The representative kings and queens first discuss what to do with Straw Hat Luffy. Meanwhile the Revolutionary Army confirms its desire to save Kuma! All while they recount how the Straw Hats have grown!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Finally, It Starts! The Conspiracy-filled Reverie!

programme.title: In order to recruit a strong ally towards bringing down Kaido, Cat Viper and his crew stop by Whitebeard's homeland to see Marco, the 1st division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Marco! The Keeper of Whitebeard's Last Memento!

programme.title: Luffy and the others become excited as they see familiar faces in a newspaper article about the Reverie while they close in on the Land of Wano. But this dangerous and foreboding land is as inaccessible as it is mysterious! The sea itself is a barrier!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Climbing Up a Waterfall! A Great Journey Through the Land of Wano's Sea Zone!

programme.title: A mysterious country, a rampaging slasher, ancient samurai rituals of seppuku - and Zoro in the crosshairs! When a street assault occurs, all signs point to Zoro! Meanwhile, Luffy finally arrives at the Land of Wano.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Land of Wano! To the Samurai Country where Cherry Blossoms Flutter!

programme.title: Stranded alone on the beach, Luffy tries to gather his bearings only to be confronted by some mysterious, and dangerous, local fauna! And then, he meets a little girl named Otama! Meanwhile, Zoro makes trouble for the others who are trying to blend in!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Otama Appears! Luffy vs. Kaido's Army!

programme.title: Otama's gratitude towards Luffy knows no bounds! But the feast she cooks him exhausts her food stores completely! As she suffers from poor drinking water, her companion tells the story of the mysterious outsider she waits for - Ace!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: He'll Come! The Legend of Ace in the Land of Wano!

programme.title: Ambushed and outgunned by a skilled bounty hunter Cidre's group, the Straw Hats rely on the Sunny's Coup de Burst to escape! But they end up stranded without cola! A nearby soda island offers a solution.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Side Story! The World's Greatest Bounty Hunter, Cidre!

programme.title: Luffy and Boa Hancock square off against the Cidre Guild! These unscrupulous bounty hunters have one thing in mind - profit at any cost! When the battle looks won, Cidre gears up in a menacing power suit!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Side Story! Clash! Luffy vs. the King of Carbonation!

programme.title: Otama recounts her promise to Ace while Luffy rushes her to medical attention. But just as they reach the wasteland, a familiar face comes into view! But Kaido's underlings show up too!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Save Otama! Straw Hat, Bounding through the Wasteland!

programme.title: Otama's temperature is going up and Luffy has no time to waste! However, Hawkins, one of Kaido's Headliners, blocks their way by showing his unique powers and skills which can harm his own men.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Headliner! Hawkins the Magician Appears!

programme.title: Luffy and Zoro have been stalled by Hawkins but their fortune looks bright as they are guided by a woman who Zoro had saved. She leads them to a teahouse and to an herbal remedy for the river poison.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Defeat is Inevitable! The Strawman's Fierce Attack!

programme.title: Otama's life is saved by Otsuru at her teahouse. The proud Otama finds it hard to take more kindness. The group learns of the Okobore Town - living on the cast-offs of the officials! Then, suddenly, they were attacked by the Shogun's men!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Greatest Day of My Life! Otama and Her Sweet Red-bean Soup!

programme.title: Otama has been kidnapped by the Gifters! She is taken to a flourishing town called Bakura Town where a creepy-looking Headliner was expecting her. Luffy and Zoro rush to rescue her along with a samurai, Okiku!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Charging into the Enemy's Territory! Bakura Town - Where Officials Thrive!

programme.title: As Luffy, Zoro, and Okiku bounce through Bakura Town on Komachiyo's back, a sumo wrestler comes flying towards them! Interested, they go down to watch sumo but the undefeated yokozuna Urashima has been expecting Okiku there.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Yokozuna Appears! The Invincible Urashima Goes After Okiku!

programme.title: Luffy challenges Urashima, the strongest yokozuna in the Land of Wano, to a sumo match! Urashima even uses illegal moves to beat Luffy at any cost! Meanwhile, Holdem tells Otama that he knows she committed a crime and he has to punish her for it.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Climactic Sumo Battle! Straw Hat vs. the Strongest Ever Yokozuna!

programme.title: After sending the yokozuna Urashima flying, Luffy and his clan continue their search for Bakura Town's boss to save Otama! They finally find the boss, Holdem, one of the Beast Pirates' Headliners.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Rages! Rescue Otama from Danger!

programme.title: Facing Holdem who is holding Otama as hostage, Luffy prepares for a fight but Okiku tries to stop him by sharing who is really ruling the region. Meanwhile, Basil Hawkins is confronted by a mysterious figure.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Taking Back Otama! A Fierce Fight Against Holdem!

programme.title: Taking down Holdem, Luffy rescues Otama and tries to catch up to Zoro and Okiku who stole the food treasure ship and started a mad dash to get out of the town!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Duel! The Magician and the Surgeon of Death!

programme.title: This is a story of Luffy in an alternate reality. While sailing on the sea by himself, a strange bird crashes into his small boat. He looks up to find a giant ship where a girl named Ann has been captured. It seems like the bird belongs to her.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Zoro and the others dash out of BakuraTown on the treasure ship filled with food! Luffy catches up to them bringing ahuge bucket of fresh water! Then, they distribute the food and the water to thepeople of Okobore Town who were thirsty and hungry.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Coming of the Treasure Ship! LuffytaroReturns the Favor!

programme.title: Infinite, (2021, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Evan McCauley has skills he never learned and memories of places he has never visited. Self-medicated and on the brink of a mental breakdown, a secret group that call themselves Infinites come to his rescue, revealing that his memories are real.

programme.title: Looper, (2012, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In this futuristic action thriller, time travel will be illegal and only available on the black market. When the mob wants to get rid of someone, they will send their target 30 years into the past where a 'looper,' a hired gun, is waiting to mop up.

programme.title: The Core, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Science fiction)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: Source Code, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars in this action thriller about a man who awakens in another man’s body to discover only he has the ability to stop a terrorist attack on a commuter train.

programme.title: Criminal, (2016, Espionage Action)
programme.desc: The memories and skills of a deceased CIA agent are implanted into an unpredictable and dangerous convict in order to complete the agent's final assignment.

programme.title: The Core, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: Apocalypto, (2006, Action)
programme.desc: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, a young man is taken on a perilous journey to a world ruled by fear and oppression.

programme.title: The Big Country, (1958, Drama)
programme.desc: Burl Ives earned a Best Supporting Actor Oscar for his portrayal of a family patriarch involved in a bitter land feud in this explosive western drama that also features a sumptuous musical score.

programme.title: Quigley Down Under, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: A self-assured American sharpshooter moves to Australia in search of employment and finds work for a despotic land baron in the Australian outback.

programme.title: Cattle Annie And Little Britches, (1981, Action)
programme.desc: Two young aspiring outlaws (Amanda Plummer and Diane Lane) manage to join what’s left of the Doolin-Dalton gang, led by the aging Bill Doolin (Burt Lancaster). The gang’s heyday may be far behind them, but there’s still plenty of adventure left!

programme.title: Wagons East!, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: They came for gold, but now they'll settle for indoor plumbing. John Candy and Richard Lewis star in this hilariously unconventional look at the legendary West.

programme.title: The Hills Run Red, (1967, Drama)
programme.desc: A man recently released from a five-year prison sentence seeks vengeance against the former friend who has violated his trust and sought his death. Starring Thomas Hunter, Henry Silva, and Dan Duryea.

programme.title: The Last Round-Up, (1947, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry is a cattle rancher determined to protect the interests of neighboring ranchers and Indians against unscrupulous land manipulators when local authorities plan to build an aqueduct.

programme.title: Trail To San Antone, (1947, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry tries to help a young jockey get back on track after an “accident” arranged by a horse trainer ruins his career. Action-packed adventure with fantastic stunts, and Gene Autry's Champion.

programme.title: A Fistful Of Dynamite, (1972, Drama)
programme.desc: The results are explosive when an Irish terrorist (James Coburn) with a dynamite obsession teams up with a Mexican peasant-turned- revolutionary (Rod Steiger) in this action-packed tale of power and politics. Directed by the legendary Sergio Leone.

programme.title: Fun with Dick and Jane, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: When an affluent couple lose all their money following a series of blunders, they turn to a life of crime to make ends meet.

programme.title: Scary Movie, (2000, Comedy)
programme.desc: The spoof that started it all. Scream with the Wayans brothers, Carmen Electra, Shannon Elizabeth, and Anna Faris as they bumble and shriek their way to horror-movie hilarity in Scary Movie.

programme.title: Scary Movie 2, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: Four teens are tricked by their professor into visiting a haunted house for a school project.

programme.title: Scary Movie 3, (2003, Comedy)
programme.desc: David Zucker (AIRPLANE!) directs SCARY MOVIE 3, which piles on hysterical, yet gratuitous, cameos with thrillers, blockbusters, and pop-culture in general getting their best goosing yet.

programme.title: Stomp The Yard, (2007, Musical)
programme.desc: DJ hasn't been in college for a day before he's entranced by a lovely co-ed, April. After joining an official step group, DJ must balance rehearsals, work, and school, while at the same time winning the heart of the girl of his dreams.

programme.title: Adaptation, (2002, Comedy)
programme.desc: Director Spike Jonze delivers a stunningly original comedy that seamlessly blends fictional characters and situations with the lives of real people. As Charlie struggles to adapt Orlean's best-selling book "The Orchid Thief".Rated: R

programme.title: Scary Movie, (2000, Comedy)
programme.desc: The spoof that started it all. Scream with the Wayans brothers, Carmen Electra, Shannon Elizabeth, and Anna Faris as they bumble and shriek their way to horror-movie hilarity in Scary Movie.

programme.title: Scary Movie 2, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: Four teens are tricked by their professor into visiting a haunted house for a school project.

programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Shingo’s friend Mika gives him a doll but Shingo unintentionally breaks the doll and hurts Mika’s feelings. Shingo decides to apologize.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi receives a love letter from Tuxedo Mask, stating that he’d like to meet her. She finds out that all the girls in town received the same letter.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Joy: A Love Letter from Tuxedo Mask

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The girls search for a vacation spot so they can focus on training. Instead, they settle on a mansion that has a very eerie service staff.
programme.sub-title: The Summer, the Beach, Youth and Ghosts

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami spots Nephrite and follows him to an animation studio that is making the Sailor V movie. Ami calls Usagi and Rei so they can investigate.
programme.sub-title: Protect the Children's Dreams: Friendship Through Anime

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Kingdom of Diamonds is hosting a party to reveal their treasure to the world. Both the Sailor Guardians and the Dark Kingdom crash the party.
programme.sub-title: Romance Under the Moon: Usagi's First Kiss

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Naru has fallen in love with Masato Sanjoin. Knowing that Sanjoin is really Nephrite, Usagi tries to convince Naru to give up on her feelings.
programme.sub-title: Wish upon a Star: Naru's First Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Nephrite uncovers Sailor Moon’s identity as Usagi. His attempt to finish her off is cut short when he learns that Naru has been kidnapped by Zoisite.
programme.sub-title: Naru's Tears: Nephrite Dies for Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A new girl named Makoto Kino transfers to Usagi’s school, but her tough attitude seems to scare everyone away. Usagi quickly becomes friends with her.
programme.sub-title: Jupiter, the Powerful Girl in Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Sailor Guardians grow in strength with its newest member Sailor Jupiter joining the team. Sailor Moon is appointed as team leader.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi learns that a transfer student named Ryo Urawa seems to have a crush on Ami, and tries to help him out.
programme.sub-title: Crushing on Ami: The Boy Who Can See the Future

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Naru attend an art exhibit by Yumemi Yumeno. Usagi and Mamoru are both asked by Yumemi to become models for her latest painting.
programme.sub-title: The Painting of Love: Usagi and Mamoru Get Closer

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Makoto discover Motoki has a girlfriend named Reika. His relationship is in jeopardy due to Reika’s chance to study abroad.
programme.sub-title: Total Chaos: The Messy Love Rectangle

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Grandpa Hino has become emotionally unstable, causing Rei to worry. The new apprentice Yuichiro tries to cheer her up.
programme.sub-title: Grandpa Loses Control: Rei in Danger

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and friends meet a girl who they believe holds the final Rainbow Crystal. But they realize it’s her pet cat that possesses the Rainbow Crystal!
programme.sub-title: Loved and Chased: Luna's Worst Day Ever

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Umino seems to have fallen in love with Naru. Naru only considers Umino a friend, so Usagi decides to play Cupid and urges them to go on a date.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: When the exploits of a Sailor Moon imposter become quite the sensation, the real Sailor Guardians step in to investigate.
programme.sub-title: Enter Venus, the Last Sailor Guardian

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Now that Sailor Venus has joined the team, all of the Sailor Guardians are finally together! Zoisite has discovered that Tuxedo Mask is Mamoru Chiba.
programme.sub-title: The Shining Silver Crystal: The Moon Princess Appears

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Tuxedo Mask is wounded while protecting Sailor Moon. The seven Rainbow Crystals gather and she is transformed into Serenity.
programme.sub-title: Returning Memories: Usagi and Mamoru's Past

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi is haunted by dreams of Tuxedo Mask, who has been abducted by the Dark Kingdom. Minako takes Usagi to a popular hair salon hoping it will help.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Confusion: Is Tuxedo Mask Evil?

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi decides to take the Princess Seminar course and the other Sailor Guardians join her. This is actually a trap set up by the Dark Kingdom.
programme.sub-title: Let's Become a Princess: Usagi's Bizarre Training

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends go to a ski resort to participate in the Moon Princess Contest, unaware that it’s Kunzite’s plan to eliminate the Moon Princess.
programme.sub-title: The Snow, the Mountains, Friendship and Monsters

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Figure-skating Janelyn & Misha offer to coach. Usagi and her friends decide to investigate. Makoto begins to receive personal lessons from Misha.
programme.sub-title: Paired with a Monster: Mako, the Ice Skating Queen

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi goes on a family vacation, where she is unexpectedly reunited with Mamoru. But Mamoru no longer remembers Usagi or even who he really is.
programme.sub-title: The Legendary Lake Yokai: The Bond of Usagi's Family

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Dark Kingdom is trying to revive the Seven Great Monsters. Sailor Mercury and Jupiter scramble to protect Ryo Urawa.
programme.sub-title: I Won't Run Away from Love Anymore: Ami vs. Mamoru

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako receives a surprise visit from Katarina, Minako’s former partner. A tragic incident forced them to go their separate ways.
programme.sub-title: Sailor Venus's Past: Minako's Tragic Love

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Moon and the other Sailor Guardians appear to have a falling-out. But it’s all part of the plan to locate the enemy’s hideout.
programme.sub-title: Usagi Abandoned: The Falling-Out of the Sailor Guardians

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Venus finds the Dark Kingdom's hideout. The Sailor Guardians fall into Kunzite’s trap, which hurls them into the past.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Awakening: A Message from the Distant Past

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Sailor Guardians head into the Arctic Circle. Queen Beryl sends the DD Girls. The Sailor Guardians fall as they try to defeat the DD Girls.
programme.sub-title: Death of the Sailor Guardians: The Tragic Final Battle

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Moon attempts to free Endymion from Queen Beryl’s control. Sailor Moon is forced to fight the man she loves.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Eternal Wish: A Brand New Life

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Having lost all memory of being Sailor Moon, Usagi now lives her life as an ordinary girl.
programme.sub-title: Moon Returns: The Mysterious Aliens Appear

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Moon finds herself facing new enemies from outer space. The two aliens disguise themselves as humans to go after other human energy.
programme.sub-title: For Love and for Justice: Sailor Guardians Once Again

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi, Mako, and Ami see a boy attacked by one of Ail and An’s Cardian monsters. To Mako’s surprise, the boy turns out to be her childhood friend.
programme.sub-title: For Whom Is the White Rose? The Moonlight Knight Appears

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi goes to a virtual reality arcade in the Juban District, where she unexpectedly runs into Mamoru, as well as Seijuro and Natsumi.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Crisis: The Tiara Stops Working

programme.title: Empire State, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: A security guard (Liam Hemsworth) and his childhood pal (Michael Angarano) make plans to rob an armored car.

programme.title: Hell or High Water, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: With a Texas Ranger (Jeff Bridges) hot on their tail, an ex-convict (Ben Foster) and his brother (Chris Pine) plan a series of heists against the bank that's about to foreclose on their family ranch.

programme.title: Standoff, (1970, Entertainment)
programme.desc: Armed with a shotgun and one bullet, a war veteran (Thomas Jane) tries to protect a young murder witness from a ruthless assassin (Laurence Fishburne).

programme.title: Destroyer, (1970, Entertainment)

Spearhead Squadron comes to the end of their long road, and a new journey begins for Lena.

Several weeks after Shin and his friends went missing, Lena is demoted from commanding Spearhead and is in charge of conventional 86 unit; Shin wakes up from his dying dream to find him and his friends in the custody of the Federacy of Giad.

Despite making friends and enjoying the luxuries the Federacy can provide, Shin and his friends can't shake the feeling that they don't belong there; on the Eve of the Holy Birth, they conclude that they will return to the battlefield.
The crew of Spearhead find themselves back on the battlefield, as the tide of the war turns against the Federacy.

With Federacy analysts predicting a massive Legion offensive, the Federacy military decides to reorganize its forces in order to prepare for the attack; in the Republic, Lena continues preparing for the Legion attack, who are closing on the borders.
The Legion's large-scale offensive begins, and the Spearhead crew are sent into the thick of the fighting, but even back at base, there's no safety to be found.

programme.title: Redenção, (2013)
programme.desc: 2013. Jason Statham é um veterano de guerra que assume uma nova identidade enquanto tenta se vingar dos assassinos de sua namorada grávida. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Agata Buzek, Jason Statham Diretor: Steven Knight

programme.title: Carga Explosiva 3, (2008)
programme.desc: 2008. Frank Martin é obrigado a conduzir Valentina, a filha de Leonid Vasilev, o chefe da Agência de Proteção Ambiental da Ucrânia, de Marselha a Odessa, além de dois sacos de conteúdo suspeito. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Jason Statham, Robert Knepper, Natalya Rudakova, François Berléand, Jeroen Krabbé, Alex Kobold, David Atrakchi, Yann Sundberg, Eriq Ebouaney, David Kammenos Diretor: Olivier Megaton

programme.title: Instinto Selvagem 2, (2006)
programme.desc: 2006. A romancista Catherine está novamente em apuros com a lei e a Scotland Yard nomeia o psiquiatra Dr. Michael Glass para avaliá-la. No entanto, como o detetive Nick Curran antes dele, Glass fica fascinado por Tramell e é atraído para um jogo sedutor. Gêneros: Drama Elenco: Sharon Stone, David Morrissey, Charlotte Rampling, David Thewlis, Stan Collymore, Indira Varma, Heathcote Williams, Hugh Dancy, Terence Harvey, Jan Ch... Diretor: Michael Caton-Jones

programme.title: Primal, (2019)
programme.desc: 2019. Frank capturou animais selvagens na selva brasileira, incluindo uma onça branca de 400 libras. Ele a envia no mesmo navio que um assassino preso. O assassino se liberta e liberta os animais. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Nicolas Cage¸ Framke Janssen, Kevin Durand, LaMonica Garrett Diretor: Nick Powell

programme.title: Crimes Cruzados, (2013)
programme.desc: 2013. As complicações surgem durante uma situação perigosa de refém em um restaurante. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Ray Liotta, Nikki Reed, Stephen Lang Diretor: David A Armstrong

programme.title: Entre a Vida e a Morte, (2013)
programme.desc: 2013. Ben Garvey leva uma vida simples ao lado de sua esposa Lisa e a filha Katie. Ele trabalha duro no Fort Garry Brewery Company, mas ainda está em período de experiência. É quando recebe a visita de seu irmão Ricky, que acabou de deixar a prisão. Gêneros: Thriller Elenco: Paul Walker, Piper Perabo Diretor: John Glenn

programme.title: Marcados Pela Guerra, (2014)
programme.desc: 2014. Uma jovem decide se alistar no exército na esperança de ser mandada para o Iraque, onde entraria em contato com uma nova cultura. Ela acaba, no entanto, sendo realocada para Guantánamo, onde se depara com uma rotina de ódio e abuso. Gêneros: Drama Elenco: Stewart, Kristen, Garrison, Liane Diretor: Peter Sattler

programme.title: Era uma vez na China, (1991)
programme.desc: 1991. No fim do século 19, Wong Fei-Hung enfrenta o saque estrangeiro na China. Com a violência crescendo, até tia Yee questiona os ideais ocidentais diante do poder do Kung Fu. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Jet Li, Biao Yuen, Rosamund Kwan, Jacky Cheung, Kent Cheng, Kam-Fai Yuen, Shi-Kwan Yen, Shun Lau, Wu Ma, Jianguo Qiu Diretor: Hark Tsui

programme.title: Endiabrado, (2000)
programme.desc: 2000. Um jovem desesperado para mudar de vida faz um acordo com o Diabo. Gêneros: Comedy Elenco: Brendan Fraser, Elizabeth Hurley, Frances O’Connor, Frances O'Connor, Paul Adelstein, Brian Doyle-Murray, Jeff Doucette, Miriam Shor, Orlando Jones, Toby Huss Diretor: Harold Ramis

programme.title: B13-U 13º Distrito - Ultimato, (2004)
programme.desc: 2004. Damien e Leito estão retornando ao Distrito 13 em uma missão para levar a paz ao setor controlado por cinco líderes de gangues diferentes, antes que os serviços secretos da cidade tomem medidas drásticas para resolver o problema. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Cyril Raffaelli, David Belle, Philippe Torreton Diretor: Patrick Alessandrin

programme.title: Caçado, (2003)
programme.desc: 2003. Aaron Hallam é um perigoso assassino, que mata suas vítimas de um modo peculiar: ele perseguia caçadores de cervos como se fosse um esporte, em uma floresta de Portland. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Tommy Lee Jones, Connie Nielsen, Benicio Del Toro, Leslie Stefanson, John Finn, José Zúñiga, Ron Canada, Mark Pellegrino, Jenna Boyd, Aaron DeCone Diretor: William Friedkin

programme.title: Fogo contra Fogo, (2020)
programme.desc: 2020. Um bombeiro fora de serviço testemunha um assassinato nas mãos de uma gangue de gangsters. Ele entra no programa de proteção a testemunhas até depor, mas não pode se esconder por muito tempo da gangue, então decide agir por conta própria. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Josh Duhamel, Bruce Willis, Rosario Dawson Diretor: David Barrett

programme.title: Sem Lei, (2011)
programme.desc: 2011. Um grupo de três amigos planeja um grande roubo que acaba dando errado quando um deles se revela um traidor. Enganado, Sonny decide assumir o problema de frente e busca vingança contra o antigo parceiro. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Bruce, Phillippe, Ryan, Willis Diretor: Mike Gunther

programme.title: Fogo contra Fogo, (2020)
programme.desc: 2020. Um bombeiro fora de serviço testemunha um assassinato nas mãos de uma gangue de gangsters. Ele entra no programa de proteção a testemunhas até depor, mas não pode se esconder por muito tempo da gangue, então decide agir por conta própria. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Josh Duhamel, Bruce Willis, Rosario Dawson Diretor: David Barrett

programme.title: Velocidade sem Limites, (2007)
programme.desc: 2007. Uma bela mulher, líder de uma banda de música, se vê envolvida em uma competição ilegal de corrida de carros realizada para entreter milionários entediados. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Angus Macfadyen, Nadia Bjorlin, Nathan Phillips Diretor: Andy Cheng

programme.title: O Assassino, (2011)
programme.desc: 2011. Um guarda-costas altamente qualificado, vingando a morte de seu irmão, descobre um círculo de corrupção que se estende aos mais altos níveis da sociedade e do governo. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Vinnie Jones, Berik Aitzhanov, Sergey Nikonenko Diretor: Akan Satayev

programme.title: Ouro Branco, (1987)
programme.desc: 1987. Rap, carrões, blusões de couro espalhafatosos e muita grana no bolso. Ace entra para o mundo do crime sem desconfiar que a partir daí sua vida já não vale mais nada. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Mekhi Phifer, Wood Harris, Chi McBride Diretor: Charles Stone III

Há muitos anos, o Monte Huaguo foi destruído pelo Reino Celestial, a morada dos deuses da mitologia chinesa, deixando Sun Wu Kong, o Rei Macaco, furioso, já que o local era seu lar. Kong está decidido a confrontar aqueles que determinaram seu destino. Gêneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Eddie Peng, Shawn Yue, Ni Ni, Xiao Bai, Hao Ou, Eddie Pang, Shan Qiao, Di Yang, Xue Yin, Feihong Yu Diretor: Chi-Kin Kwok

programme.title: Um Homem Comum, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Um criminoso de guerra procurado mundo afora conhece uma empregada e um estranho relacionamento surge entre eles. Quando a calmaria parece estabelecida na vida dele, ela descobre que há uma recompensa milionária para quem souber onde o fugitivo está. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: O Livro do Amor, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Na esperança de encontrar seu pai, adolescente problemática pede para um arquiteto viúvo construir uma jangada para que ela possa atravessar oceano. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Double Dragon, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Shadow Master começa a operar um ringue de luta ilegal em uma área isolada de Metro City e força Vortex, um artista marcial, a participar do torneio. Billy e Jimmy precisam ajudá-lo antes que o Mestre das Sombras possa se livrar deles. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: O Amor Está por Aí, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Rodrigo confessa ao avô que está apaixonado por Matilda, sem saber que ela está trabalhando na casa dele, substituindo sua irmã Brela. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: O Amor Está por Aí, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Brela vai até a casa dos patrões para descobrir se Matilda teve contato com Rodrigo, e não entende por que um mulherengo como ele ainda não tentou nada com sua irmã. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: O Amor Está por Aí, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Matilda, uma jovem bela, alegre, sonhadora e boa estudante trabalha em uma cafeteria e tem dois grandes sonhos, tornar-se uma grande arquiteta e ser o amor de um rapaz bonito que sempre para para comprar algo em seu caminho para o trabalho. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: O Amor Está por Aí, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Armando se aproxima mais de Matilda, a convida para tomar um sorvete e ela aceita. Depois, ao deixá-la em casa, Matilda imagina Rodrigo ali falando com ela. Gabito e Livi os encontram. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Número da Sorte, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Um nova-iorquino que está com a vida de cabeça para baixo herda o antigo número de celular de um superstar do basquete americano. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Para Ser Sincero, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Sócios vão à falência com a crise que atinge negócios virtuais e são forçados a fazer o que mais temiam: um volta a morar com os pais e o outro, pai de família, tem que procurar um emprego de verdade. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Todo Mundo Hispânico, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Ramira mata acidentalmente uma das crianças de quem ela cuidava e decide mentir sobre isso. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Festival Sangrento, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Fãs de terror vão a um festival celebrando os clássicos do gênero, apenas para descobrir que o carismático artista por trás do evento tem intenções diabólicas. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Forasteiros Malditos, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Um açougueiro tímido e sua irmã gêmea se aventuram na Austrália em busca de sua mãe biológica. Mas os habitantes aparentemente tolerantes de sua cidade natal escondem um segredo sombrio. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Colossal, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Gloria descobre que está conectada à uma criatura gigantesca que está destruindo Seul e deve descobrir por que a sua existência aparentemente insignificante tem um impacto tão colossal sobre o destino da Terra. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Uma Longa Queda, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Quatro estranhos planejam saltar juntos do mesmo edifício na véspera do Ano Novo. Eles formam uma espécie de família problemática e decidem que têm seis semanas para encontrar razões legítimas para continuar vivos. Gêneros: Entertainment

programme.title: Um Inverno em Nova York, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Clara é uma jovem mãe em busca de um recomeço em Nova York. Em uma emocionante jornada, ela recebe a ajuda inesperada de estranhos muito generosos. Com a sua gentileza, eles a guiam durante as dificuldades da vida. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: O Falsificador, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Ray Cutter sai da prisão, mas precisa reproduzir um valioso quadro e roubar o original para não ser preso novamente. Enquanto está fora das grades, Ray tenta se reconectar com seu filho e pede a ajuda de seu velho pai neste novo objetivo. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: À Espera da Chuva, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Após a morte misteriosa de seu pai, uma jornalista volta à sua cidade natal no interior. Ao chegar, descobre que o local está devastado pela seca e se tornou um lugar atormentado por gangues e os maus efeitos da pobreza extrema. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Evidências de um Crime, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. O policial Tom Cutler abandonou a profissão depois da morte da mulher para se concentra em criar a filha Rose. Ele sobrevive limpando cenas de crime, mas um trabalho rotineiro acaba ameaçando a vida estável que construiu para si próprio e a filha. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Teenagers - As Apimentadas, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. O time campeão de animadoras de torcida, de bairro rico, descobre que sua capitã anterior roubou a coreografia de um time concorrente, do centro da cidade. O campeonato está chegando, e elas precisam correr para criar outra coreografia. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Arn - O Cavaleiro Templário, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Arn foi criado para ser um monge e um bravo guerreiro. Ao deixar sua terra, em meio à guerra entre cristãos e muçulmanos, ele conhece Cecília e se apaixona, porém, Arn é enviado para lutar na Terra Santa como um cavaleiro templário. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Enquanto Houver Esperança, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Angélica é uma adolescente de 16 anos que luta contra uma forma rara de câncer. E, enquanto seus pais batalham para custear seu tratamento e ganhar mais tempo de vida para a garota, ela se apaixona pela primeira vez. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: A História de Wim de A a Z, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Conheça a história do órfão Wim, um menino que quer muito ir à escola em vez de passar o tempo todo trabalhando forçadamente na fábrica da cidade. Com muita força de vontade, Wim consegue escapar e encontrar novos amigos. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Faça um Desejo!, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Quatro crianças descobrem uma criatura mágica que concede desejos em uma viagem à praia. Elas só não imaginavam que o vizinho esquisitão da casa ao lado também está de olho nesses poderes. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: E Agora? A Mamãe Saiu de Férias!, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Giulia, mãe de três crianças elétricas, decide ir viajar sem a família por dez dias, e o caos da casa sobra para Carlo, marido e pai que vive apenas para o trabalho. Perdido e com um problema nas mãos, ele tem que se virar para dar conta. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Uma Beleza Fantástica, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Um conto de fadas contemporâneo sobre o surgimento de uma amizade improvável entre uma jovem solitária que sonha ser autora de livros infantis e um viúvo rabugento. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: A Árvore da Vida, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. História de uma típica família americana dos anos 50, formada por um casal e três filhos. A rígida educação, o ambiente e o passado ainda permeiam a vida de Jack, o filho mais velho, que na vida adulta tenta se reconciliar com o pai. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: Roubo a Máfia, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Tommy e Rosie são um casal apaixonado, mas que acabam presos ao serem flagrados roubando. Após esse deslize, eles tentam ganhar a vida honestamente, mas logo ele se vê envolvido no julgamento de um famoso assassino da máfia. Gêneros: Drama

programme.title: 1988. Diante de Touha, surge um novo inimigo e seu nome, estranhamente, é Jiraiya. Qual a verdadeira identidade dele? Qual o segredo escondido por trás disso? Vestindo a Jiraiya Suit ele avança sobre o indefeso Touha. Touha terá chance de vencê-lo? programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Habilidades Secretas De Chiyo - T01E22
programme.desc: 2007. Sakura é pega pelas táticas de sasori e fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno. Mas ela usa uma papel bomba para se livrar da fumaçavenenosa. Ela resolver se arriscar a capturar sasori para forçá-lo a dar informações sobre o paradeiro de orochimaru. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pai E Mãe - T01E23
programme.desc: 2007. A maior vantagem dos bonecos criados de humanos é que ele pode assumir o comando do jutsu que o humano usava enquanto vivo.consequentemente, o boneco do terceiro kazekage tem ahabilidade especial de converter chakra em poder magnético. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Terceiro Kazekage - T01E24
programme.desc: 2007. Sakura revida oataque da areia de ferro do boneco do terceiro kazekage com uma força sobre-humana. Ela aprendeu com tsunade que a habilidade mais importante de um médico ninja é se evadir um ataque. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: 2008. Apesar de L ainda ser suspeito, Light e Misa (suas memórias de terem sido Kira foram apagadas) voltam ao quartel. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E18

programme.title: 2008. Matsuda, o elemento do corpo especial encarregado de monitor Misa, decide espionar por conta própria Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E19

programme.title: 2008. A equipe de L descobre que o Grupo Yotsuba está reunida em segredo para discutir a eliminação dos indivíduos que são problemáticos para a sua empresa. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E20

programme.title: 2008. O Grupo Yotsuba contrata Eraldo Bobina para descobrir a identidade de L. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E21

programme.title: 2008. Misa consegue sucesso ao reduzir a um suspeito a identidade de Kira dentro do Grupo Yotsuba: Higuchi. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E22

programme.title: 2008. Higuchi do Grupo Yotsuba, tenta matar Matsuda do corpo especial. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E23

programme.title: 2008. Higuchi é capturado e conta aos investigadores tudo sobre o Death Note. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E24

programme.title: 2008. Light recuperou suas memórias, em seguida dá ordens a Misa que retome os assassinatos. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E25

programme.title: 2008. Light removeu todos os obstáculos de seu caminho, e está perto de alcançar o seu mundo perfeito. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E26

programme.title: 2008. Aparece um novo investigador, Near, uma figura central na SPK, uma organização dedicada a pegar Kira sem depender de L. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E27

programme.title: 2008. Light atuando como L, revela a Near que sua irmã Sayu foi raptada por alguém que quer trocá-la por um Death Note. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E28

programme.title: 2008. Light tenta descobrir onde Mello e da máfia se escondem. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E29

programme.title: 2008. Mello entra na sede da SPK para recuperar uma foto dele e certificar-se de não ser morto por Kira. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E30

programme.title: 2008. Near contata o novo quartel geral da força especial e determina que Kira está entre os seus integrantes. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E31

programme.title: 2008. A estrela locutora de notícias Kiyomi Takada se torna a porta-voz mundial de Kira. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E32

programme.title: 2008. Light tem como objetivo investigar Kiyomi, enquanto os integrantes do corpo especial escutam pelo auto-falante. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E33

programme.title: 2008. Aizawa percebe o que está acontecendo e alerta Near, o qual já sabia sobre as notas. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E34

programme.title: 2008. Light dá a Kiyomi a ordem para matar Near. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E35

programme.title: 2008. De acordo com o acerto, Near e o SPK se encontram com Light e o corpo especial em um armazém. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E36

programme.title: 2008. Embora Mikami tenha escrito os nomes de todos no Death Note, estavam vivos. Near consegue o Death Note e tudo é revelado. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E37

programme.title: 2007. O brilhante, mas entediado estudante da escola Light Yagami encontra-se mantendo o poder da vida e da morte em suas mãos, o Death Note. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E01

programme.title: 2007. Enquanto os criminosos do mundo continuam a morrer, L atende representantes de várias nações. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E02

programme.desc: Death Note - T01E04

programme.title: 2007. Soichiro Yagami exige uma reunião em pessoa com L quando ele descobre que ele secretamente levou agentes do FBI para o Japão. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E05

programme.title: 2007. Light se reune com uma mulher no departamento de polícia, pois tem uma mensagem importante para o Kira. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E06

programme.title: 2007. Light usa o Death Note para tentar se livrar de uma mulher que poderia ter levado para a prisão. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E07

programme.title: 2007. L coloca microfones e câmeras nas casas dos membros do grupo especial, incluindo a casa de Yagami, mas Light dá um passo a frente. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E08

programme.title: 2007. Os assassinatos continuam, e L começa a suspeitar do comportamento perfeito de Light que então decide investigar por conta própria. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E09

programme.title: 2007. As suspeitas de L estão cada vez maior, e Light o convence a convidá-lo para a investigação. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Alexandre Drumond, Ana Lucia, Charles Manuel, Jorge Vasconcellos, José Leonardo, Sergio Cantu Diretor: Tetsuro Araki
programme.desc: Death Note - T01E10

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Ameaça Se Aproxima - T02E72
