Sem outra alternativa senão confiar nos sentidos místicos de yuukimaru, kakashi e os outros seguem a orientação do menino e tentam uma missão de salvamento Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Contra Ataque Da Marca Da Maldição - T02E109
programme.sub-title: O Contra Ataque Da Marca Da Maldição
programme.desc: 2009. Apesar da tentativa de salvamento, naruto e guren não retornam. A frustração aumenta entre o grupo, mas quando a besta de três caudas desperta de seu sono, a equipe de selamento faz uma segunda tentativa com a barreira de selamento de quatro pontas. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Consciência Culpada - T02E110
programme.desc: 2009. Kabuto planeja fazer a três caudas matar os ninja da folha sacrificando o poder e a vida de yuukimaru. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Promessa Quebrada - T02E111
programme.desc: 2009. Kabuto finalmente aparece na frente de naruto. Sabendo que orochimaru usou guren e yuukimaru para seus próprios propósitos, um naruto enfurecido entra em batalha contra kabuto. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Lugar Para Retornar‏ - T02E112
programme.desc: 2009. Os ninjas da folha estão tratando seus ferimentos. A batalha deixou todos com sérios ferimentos. Shizune examina yuukimaru, que está em coma, mas seu corpo não é mais capaz de controlar a três caudas. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Voltando Para Casa - T01E01
programme.desc: 2007. Na aldeia da folha, a equipe de konohamaru foi promovida a genin e agora vai a missões nível d sob a supervisão de ebisu. As constante reclamações de konohamaru lembra iruka e os outros de naruto.até que uma figura passa pelos portões. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Os Akatsuki Entram Em Ação - T01E02
programme.desc: 2007. Jiraiya completou seu novo romance, amassos no paraíso, para felicidade de kakashi. Mas jiraiya também trouxe notícias altamente secretas de que os akatsuki entraram em ação. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Os Resultados Do Treinamento - T01E03
programme.desc: 2007. As habilidades combinadas de naruto e sakura forçam kakashi usar seu sharingan imediatamente. Naruto habilmente lança um jutsu após outro. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Jinchuriki Da Areia - T01E04
programme.desc: 2007. Gaara rapidamente descobrir a presença da deidara, e uma batalha aérea com deidara em seu pássaro gigante e gaara acontece na areia. O jonin da areia é yura que, na verdade, é um agente da akatsuki, e a aldeia da areia sofre grandes danos. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Kazekage Se Mantém No Alto - T01E05
programme.desc: 2007. Naruto e sakura derrotam kakashi no desafio de sobrevivência. Tsunade os nomeia como uma equipe de três liderados por kakashi, e diz que agora eles são todos iguais. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Missão Cumprida - T01E06
programme.desc: 2007. Para proteger sua aldeia da argila explosiva de deidara, gaara usa seu chakra para criar um escudo de areia gigante. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Corra Kankuro - T01E07
programme.desc: 2007. Gaara, totalmente sem forças, é arrastado paralonge por deidara. Kankuro ignora esforços de baki de parar deidara e sai imediatamente em perseguição com um pelotão para salvar gaara. programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Equipe Kakashi Se Mobiliza - T01E08
programme.desc: 2007. A caminho da aldeia da areia, temari encontra kakashi e sua equipe. Kakashi chama naruto quando ele tenta seguir adiante e naruto explode sua raiva pelos akatsuki. Gêneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Lagrimas Do Jinchuriki - T01E09
programme.desc: 2007. Uma mensagem urgente da aldeia da areia informando o sequestro do kazekage pelos akatsuki chega à aldeia da folha. Tsunade não perde tempo em mandar a equipe kakashi para a aldeia da areia. Enquanto isso, kankuro começa a sua batalha contra os akatsuki. programme.desc: The overnight train from Glasgow to London is hacked; passengers are trapped on board, including police officer Joe; as the train hurtles towards disaster, Joe manages to make contact with Abby, the cyber security director.

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: Grief boils into vengeance; Rob crosses a line, and the innocence in him dies; what rises in its place will shape the future of England.

programme.title: How Not to Hire a Hitman
programme.desc: Bob and Farah are locked in a messy custody battle over their three young children; when one of them ends up dead, the men accused of the murder point the finger at the surviving spouse.

programme.title: The Lie: The Murder of Grace Millane
programme.desc: The headline-grabbing murder of 21-year-old British backpacker Grace Millane while on a solo holiday in New Zealand.

programme.title: The Bad Guardian
programme.desc: When Leighs father, Jason, suffers a fall, the courts assign him a guardian named Janet to help. But when Janet takes over every aspect of Jasons life, Leigh must find the strength to take down the guardian and the corrupt system that supports her. Starring Melissa Joan Hart, La La Anthony, Luis Bordonada.

programme.title: Retrograde
programme.desc: A minor traffic citation spirals into an all-consuming obsession for a young woman when she decides to take on the police and the city. Starring Molly Reisman, Sofia Banzhaf, Bessie Cheng.

programme.title: Finally Caught
programme.desc: When a vibrant bisexual woman is found dead, her Craigslist lover blames the victims boyfriend; a tip from a hit television show reveals the true killer, leading to a chase around the world in an attempt to place them behind bars.

programme.title: Charmed to Death
programme.desc: When law enforcement student Amanda Sigers falls in love with dreamy Sayantan Ghose, she has no idea that she is taking on the criminal case of her life.

programme.title: Charmed to Death
programme.sub-title: A Bride Who Will Never Be
programme.desc: When Melanie meets James Addie, she believes shes found the perfect guy, until the day she learns about his double life; as the days count down to his second wedding, James secret is in danger of being exposed and soon someone will die.

programme.title: Charmed to Death
programme.desc: Sean Scott marries his high school sweetheart, Wendi Ellis, but things soon turn sour as Wendi racks up offenses; in the final conflict, Sean must choose between his familys survival and his sworn vow.

programme.desc: When Jordan gets a new boss, the job becomes more than she bargained for. She receives help in the form of a life coach named Liz, but this coach has plans of her own. Starring Vivica A. Fox, Morgan Bradley, Allison McAtee.

programme.desc: Just outside Athens, Wis., Kenneth Kunz finds four of his family members murdered and one missing; investigators determine whether it was his mother, a local farm boy, or the rumored family drug dealing connections that led to the brutal slayings.

programme.title: Heartland Homicide
programme.desc: The chief of police in Sparta, Mich., leads an investigation into what happened to his family friend and babysitter, who is reported missing when she doesnt come home from Christmas shopping, and is found beneath a snow bank weeks later.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Nut Job
programme.desc: Bernie enrolls the children in a myriad of activities, then discovers his Saturdays are at stake.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - The Other Sister
programme.desc: Bernies sister wants to help raise her niece and nephew but squabbles with her brother over parenting methods.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Meet the Grandparents
programme.desc: Wandas parents take over the household during their visit.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - For a Few Dollars More
programme.desc: Bernie bribes kids to attend Jordans birthday bash instead of another kids party that is slated for the same day.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show - Eye of the Tiger
programme.desc: Jordan tries out for the basketball team, but the coach decides he is better suited for gymnastics as a ribbon dancer.

programme.title: 6 Minutes to Glory: The HBCU Band Experience - HBCU All Star Battle of the Bands
programme.desc: Aspire TVs 6 Minutes to Glory brings six HBCU marching bands to the historic Battle of the Bands at Mercedes Benz Stadium in Atlanta; after months of practice and preparation, these performers are determined to leave their legacy on the field.

programme.desc: Master-of-disguises Simon Templar (Val Kilmer) falls for a U.S. scientist (Elisabeth Shue) whose cold-fusion formula he must steal.

programme.title: Rivers Edge (1987)
programme.desc: Small-town teens (Crispin Glover, Keanu Reeves) react oddly after a peer strangles his girlfriend and shows them the corpse.

programme.title: High Noon (1952)
programme.desc: On the verge of retirement, a marshal (Gary Cooper) stands alone to face a vengeful gunman and his gang.

programme.title: Breakheart Pass (1975)
programme.desc: An undercover agent (Charles Bronson) rides an Old West train with troops, killers and a mystery on board.

programme.title: Death Wish II (1982)
programme.desc: The architect (Charles Bronson) from New York turns vigilante in Los Angeles after more brutality too close to home.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon (1987)
programme.desc: A detective (Danny Glover) with a family hunts drug smugglers with his new partner, a loner (Mel Gibson) with a death wish.

programme.title: Air Force One (1997)
programme.desc: Demanding the release of a political prisoner, a terrorist and his gang hijack the U.S. presidents plane.

programme.title: The Terminator (1984)
programme.desc: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop a cyborg killing machine, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanitys future salvation.

programme.title: Stargate (1994)
programme.desc: A portal takes an Egyptologist (James Spader), a colonel (Kurt Russell) and a team of soldiers to another planet with pyramids, slaves and an alien ruler.

programme.title: The Core (2003)
programme.desc: In order to save mankind, scientists and astronauts must set off a nuclear device at the center of the Earth.

programme.title: The Hillside Strangler
programme.sub-title: The Many Faces of Ken Bianchi
programme.desc: Detectives link two killings in Bellingham, WA, to Ken Bianchi, exposing him as the Hillside Strangler; facing death row, he claims amnesia and submits to hypnosis; decades later, Bianchi argues his murderous confessions were fabricated.

programme.title: Vanished
programme.desc: Alice searches for her boyfriend Tom, uncovering secrets in his charity that make her question his past and what she thought she knew.

programme.title: The Hillside Strangler
programme.desc: Bianchis insanity plea collapses, and he flips on cousin Angelo Buono to avoid the death penalty; but as the trial becomes a media circus, Bianchis story keeps changing, forcing the district attorney to move to dismiss the case.

programme.title: Legally Blonde (2001)
programme.desc: A sorority queen (Reese Witherspoon) enrolls in Harvard to prove to her former boyfriend that she has more than good looks.

programme.title: Legally Blonde 2: Red, White and Blonde (2003)
programme.sub-title: Legally Blonde 2: Red, White and Blonde (2003)
programme.desc: Fired from her firm, a young Boston lawyer (Reese Witherspoon) heads to Washington, D.C., to fight for animal rights.

programme.title: Posse (1993)
programme.desc: Spanish-American War deserters (Mario Van Peebles, Stephen Baldwin, Charles Lane) wind up defending a black township from a sheriff and his henchmen.

programme.title: Tommys Honour (2016)
programme.desc: Tom and Tommy Morris, father and son pioneers of professional golf, relied on skill, business acumen and working-class street smarts to make Tommy one of the worlds first sports superstars and found the modern game of golf.

programme.title: The High and the Mighty (1954)
programme.desc: On a flight from Hawaii to California, the engine dies on the plane Dan is flying. As he prepares for a crash landing, the passengers reassess their lives.
The son (Robert De Niro) of a landowner and the son (Gerard Depardieu) of a peasant become enemies in 20th-century Italy.

programme.title: Jennifer 8 (1992)
programme.desc: An ex-Los Angeles detective (Andy Garcia) turns small-town policeman and falls for a blind woman (Uma Thurman) vulnerable to a killer.

programme.title: Eagle Eye (2008)
programme.desc: Two strangers (Shia LaBeouf, Michelle Monaghan) become pawns of a mysterious woman who threatens their friends and family and uses technology to control their actions.

programme.title: Road to Perdition (2002)
programme.desc: Accompanied by his eldest son, a Depression-era mob enforcer (Tom Hanks) seeks revenge after the rest of his family are murdered by his employers (Paul Newman) jealous son.

programme.title: The Firm (1993)
programme.desc: A law-school grad uncovers a sinister secret about the Tennessee firm that made him an offer he couldnt refuse.

programme.title: Valkyrie (2008)
programme.desc: Fearing that Hitler will destroy his beloved Germany, Col. Claus von Stauffenberg joins a group of high-ranking men who are plotting to assassinate him.

programme.title: The Right Stuff (1983)
programme.desc: The selection and training of the first U.S. astronauts take place amid political maneuvering and media hype.

programme.title: Vanished
programme.desc: Alice searches for her boyfriend Tom, uncovering secrets in his charity that make her question his past and what she thought she knew.

programme.title: The Hillside Strangler
programme.desc: Bianchis insanity plea collapses, and he flips on cousin Angelo Buono to avoid the death penalty; but as the trial becomes a media circus, Bianchis story keeps changing, forcing the district attorney to move to dismiss the case.

programme.title: Unprotected Sets
programme.desc: After her dreams of becoming a WNBA player are cut short by a tragic accident, Zainab Johnson finds her way to the stage, where her smart and edgy storytelling is informed by her experiences growing up in Harlem in an African-American Muslim family.

programme.title: Cinema Paradiso (1988)
programme.desc: A Sicilian boy (Salvatore Cascio) discovers the movies with his local theaters projectionist (Philippe Noiret).

programme.title: This is Christmas (2022)
programme.desc: Following Adam and Emma on their daily commute from the village of Langton to London, where they meet the same passengers every day.

programme.title: The Pink Panther Strikes Again (1976)
programme.desc: Inspector Clouseau (Peter Sellers) is on the trail of his ex-boss (Herbert Lom), who is out to destroy the world.

programme.title: Tank Girl (1995)
programme.desc: A renegade (Lori Petty) challenges the controller (Malcolm McDowell) of the worlds water supply on a post-apocalyptic desert Earth.

programme.title: She Rides Shotgun (2025)
programme.desc: Marked for death by unrelenting enemies, a newly released ex-con must protect his estranged 11-year-old daughter from a corrupt sheriff and a brutal gang leader wholl stop at nothing to protect his criminal interests.

programme.title: Navy SEALS (1990)
programme.desc: Sea/air/land commandos (Charlie Sheen, Michael Biehn) and a TV newswoman (Joanne Whalley-Kilmer) rescue hostages from terrorists armed with Stinger missiles.

programme.title: Vanished
programme.desc: Alice searches for her boyfriend Tom, uncovering secrets in his charity that make her question his past and what she thought she knew.

programme.title: The Running Man (1987)
programme.desc: A police-state scapegoat (Arnold Schwarzenegger) must play a TV hosts (Richard Dawson) deadly game show for the 21st-century masses.

programme.title: The Running Man (1987)
programme.desc: A police-state scapegoat (Arnold Schwarzenegger) must play a TV hosts (Richard Dawson) deadly game show for the 21st-century masses.

programme.title: Black Lotus (2023)
programme.desc: A soldier uses his military training to rescue the kidnapped daughter of his dead friend.

programme.title: The Yards (2000)
programme.desc: A friends lure of easy money draws an ex-con into the corrupt world of his uncles subway-train business.

programme.title: Changing Lanes (2002)
programme.desc: An attorney and a recovering alcoholic have a car accident which swiftly escalates into an ongoing, bitter feud.

programme.title: Camp X-Ray (2014)
programme.desc: A female guard (Kristen Stewart) at Guantanamo Bay forms an unlikely friendship with one of the facilitys longtime detainees.

programme.title: Boudica: Queen of War (2023)
programme.desc: Roman conquerors slay King Prasutagus, take away his children, and force his wife, Boudica, into subservience. Consumed by grief and a burning desire for justice, Boudica vows to reclaim her homeland from the clutches of the Romans.

programme.title: Bull (2021)
programme.desc: Ten years after he was last seen, a vicious mob enforcer returns home to find his son and methodically track down the gang that double-crossed him. His quest for revenge soon leads to a savage showdown between his wife and her mob boss father.

programme.title: The Last Manhunt (2022)
programme.desc: In 1909 Willie Boy and his love, Carlota, go on the run after he accidentally shoots her father in a confrontation gone terribly wrong. With President Taft coming to the area, the local sheriff leads two Native American trackers to hunt them down.

programme.title: Captive (2015)
programme.desc: Recovering drug addict Ashley Smith (Kate Mara) reads Rick Warrens "The Purpose Driven Life" as armed fugitive Brian Nichols (David Oyelowo) holds her hostage in her apartment.

programme.title: Star Trek: Nemesis (2002)
programme.desc: The crew (Jonathan Frakes, Brent Spiner) of the Enterprise must prevent a replica of Capt. Picard (Patrick Stewart) from overtaking Earth.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)
programme.desc: Globe-trotting archaeologist Indiana Jones races the Nazis for possession of a legendary religious artifact.

programme.title: Serpico (1973)
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Frank Serpico, who sacrificed his career to expose widespread corruption in the NYPD.

programme.title: Cop Land (1997)
programme.desc: The sheriff (Sylvester Stallone) of a small New Jersey police community confronts key men (Harvey Keitel, Ray Liotta) on both sides of a law-enforcement cover-up.

programme.title: Heist 88 (2023)
programme.desc: A criminal mastermind decides to pull one last job before going to prison and recruits a group of young bank employees to steal millions in a daring and brazen assault on the U.S. banking system.

programme.title: Baby Driver (2017)
programme.desc: Coerced into working for a crime boss, a talented getaway driver must face the music when a doomed heist threatens his life, love and freedom.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981)
programme.desc: Globe-trotting archaeologist Indiana Jones races the Nazis for possession of a legendary religious artifact.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
programme.sub-title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
programme.desc: In 1935 archaeologist Jones (Harrison Ford), a lounge singer (Kate Capshaw) and a Chinese orphan (Ke Huy Quan) search for mystical stones stolen from an Indian tribe.

programme.title: Top Gun (1986)
programme.desc: For Lieutenant Pete "Maverick" Mitchell and his friend and co-pilot Nick "Goose" Bradshaw, being accepted into an elite training school for fighter pilots is a dream come true. But a tragedy will threaten Petes dreams of becoming an ace pilot.

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears (2002)
programme.desc: Jack Ryan (Ben Affleck) and the CIA director (Morgan Freeman) try to stop terrorists who are planning a nuclear attack.

programme.title: The Painter (2024)
programme.desc: An ex-CIA operative is tracked down by a young woman and they become entangled in an unauthorized black ops program.

programme.title: Kindred (2025)
programme.desc: A pair of twisted, young criminals decide to break into a mansion for one big score, but they soon find out that the owners of the house are much more dangerous than they are.

programme.title: The Outlaws (2024)
programme.desc: A group of outlaws awaken to their empty train heist bag. Interrogations begin as each cowboy becomes the focus in an attempt to unmask the thief among them. Tensions mount as each bandit struggles to clear their name before bullets fly.

programme.title: The Godfather (1972)
programme.desc: Crime boss Vito Corleone and his sons, the ruthless yet loyal members of the Corleone family, rule their secretive New York empire with an iron fist.

programme.title: The Hunt for Red October (1990)
programme.desc: Moscow, Washington and a CIA analyst (Alec Baldwin) track a renegade Soviet captain (Sean Connery) and his new submarine.

programme.title: Deadlock (2021)
programme.desc: A retired Army ranger must save thousands of innocent lives when a rogue team of mercenaries brutally seizes an energy plant and holds everyone inside hostage.

programme.title: The Last Stop in Yuma County (2023)
programme.sub-title: The Last Stop in Yuma County (2023)
programme.desc: Stranded at an Arizona rest stop, a traveling knife salesman gets thrust into a high-stakes hostage situation by the arrival of two bank robbers who will stop at nothing to protect their ill-begotten fortune.

programme.title: Inside Angling
programme.desc: Tommo takes on the challenge of attempting to land a white marlin on spinning gear, casting soft plastic lures to these spectacular fish. The waters of Morocco teem with these amazing billfish for a few weeks of each year as they migrate past.

programme.title: Wild Fly
programme.desc: Still water trout fishing like youve never seen it before. We showcase the incredible cold waters of the Drakensberg Mountain region, where ferocious trout are lured to fast-moving surface frog patterns.

programme.title: Wild Fish Wild Places
programme.desc: Still immersed in the raw beauty of Fort Peck, Denis and Austin are on a mission to unlock the secrets of its giant walleye. After multiple days of tough fishing, long boat rides, and trial-and-error tactics, they finally crack the code.

programme.title: Fishing the Wild With Mike Robinson
programme.sub-title: South Devon Spearfishing and Line fishing
programme.desc: The crew go fishing for pollack with an ex-commercial fisherman as well as spearfishing with huge shoals of sea bass.

programme.desc: Featuring deep sea fishing, sea fly fishing and fishing charters in and around Cape Town.
